
Instruction: Demo

# Feature Demonstrations (Demos)
You are tasked with creating a feature demo based on the most recent unit of work as if the work was being presented during an Agile sprint-end demo to stakeholders.

## Types of Demos
Demos fall under one or more of the following categories.
- Utilize Playwright or Puppeteer for creation of demos
- Demos should be in either a .mp4 or .gif format
- All demo artifacts should be placed at ./demo within the root of the project workspace.
